Argument.name: identities
Argument.Prompt: Number of correlated identities to create
Argument.Description: Number of correlated identities to create

Argument.name: accounts
Argument.Prompt: Number of accounts per correlated identity
Argument.Description: Number of accounts per correlated identity

Argument.name: instances
Argument.Prompt: Number of instances per account (at least 1)
Argument.Description: Number of instances per account (at least 1)

Argument.name: attributes
Argument.Prompt: Number of attributes per account link
Argument.Description: Number of attributes per account link

Argument.name: entitlements
Argument.Prompt: Number of entitlement entries per account link
Argument.Description: Number of entitlement entries per account link

Argument.name: acctgroups
Argument.Prompt: Number of accountgroup entries per account link
Argument.Description: Number of accountgroup entries per account link

Argument.name: file
Argument.Prompt: File name for the simulated data
Argument.Description: File name for the simulated data
